name: LMBGame
description:
Original description (February 21, 2013):

WARNING:

THIS GAME DOES NOT HANDLE WELL IF YOU USE CHROME. PLEASE SWITCH TO A DIFFERENT BROWSER.

VERSION 8

You heard me right folks, I made a game based on this wiki!

Defeat the Spambots as the chatmods in retro pixel art glory!

CONTROLS:

Move Left: Left Arrow

Move Right: Right Arrow

Jump: Up Arrow

Attack: Space

TOUCHSCREEN CONTROLS:

Move Left: Touch Left Button

Move Right: Touch Right Button

Jump: Touch Up Arrow

Attack: Touch Attack Button

NOTE: TOUCHSCREEN IS IN TEST, PLEASE REPORT BUGS.

UPCOMING:

"Admin Powers"

"Even More Chatmods"

Possible Implemented:

"Rollbacks" - Fat people who "roll back" onto the SpamBots.

"Ugly Roger Federer boss" (Only if you play as Rio).

"Gangster Enemy"

Known Bugs:

When starting Version 2.0, Aok is always spawned, then changes to the correct character(Status: Fixed)

When the ground is touched, the character turns invisible/falls through the floor. (Status: Fixed.)

End Game screen does not appear. (Status: Fixed.)

"RIGHT" crashes game. (Status: Fixed.)

Chat Mod cannot attack to the left. (Status: Fixed).

Touch Controls not detecting Mobile Device. (Status: Fixed).

Please Report Bugs If You Find ThemDevlog

Version 1.0- Launch.

Version 2.0- Added Doctor Flux, Obi, Klintrin, and Rio as playable characters.

Version 3.0- Added touchscreen support(in progress). Added Swipe. Fixed Aok spawn bug. Fixed End Game Screen Not Appearing bug.

Version 4.0- Added touchscreen buttons. Added Rio as an(actual) playable character. Fixed bug with dropping through the floor(hopefully). Fixed negative health bar bug(hopefully).

Version 5.0- THIS WHOLE VERSION WAS A COMPLETE FAILURE. (I did fix the no spawning spambots glitch however).

Version 6.0- Fixed mobile support(finally). Added new level. Added.... bawss stuff.

Version 8.0- Added four new characters, fixed touch support attack not working.
